name: Push and Pull (disfunkty)
description:
Ted Small and Antonio Lepore set out to make a game in four days with 3D models by Leigh Baton, this is the result. The project was started on January 27th 2020 and completed January 30Th, enjoy!

This game is in it's teaser form, we will be adding to this game in February.

Theme: Indirect interaction

Title: Push and Pull

Concept: Fly your ship into an asteroid field and recover salvageable objects

Product Info: Unity, 3D.

Summary: Complete the training simulation for new recruits by moving cargo boxes and broken ships (or pieces of them) into the goal area.

Outline: Learn to maneuver and manipulate objects, collect everything by moving things into the claim site. Try not to damage the ship or the recoverable items before running out of fuel. 

Wwise Version: 2019.1.6.7110

Unity Version: 2019.2.17f1

Starfield Skybox by Pulsar Bytes from the Unity asset store.
